items.title: Is The Sherwin-Williams Company (SHW) the Best Dow Stock?
items.description: We recently published a list of The Best and Worst Dow Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE:SHW) stands against other Dow stocks. The Dow Jones Industrial Average is a benchmark index of the top 30 companies in the US. It represents the strength of [â€¦]

items.title: Sherwin-Williams is the Most Awarded Brand for Paint Customer Satisfaction in 2025 by J.D. Power; Customers name Sherwin-Williams #1 in Customer Satisfaction with both Interior Paint and Exterior Paint
items.description: CLEVELAND- The Sherwin-Williams Company earned first place honors in customer satisfaction with interior and exterior paint in the J.D. Power 2025 U.S Paint Satisfaction Study. This is the third...
